titles.title: HIRE Now Tax Cut Extension Act of 2010
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the payroll tax relief under the HIRE Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/21/2010--Introduced. HIRE Now Tax Cut Extension Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend until June 30, 2011, the exemption from payment of employment taxes for individuals who begin employment after July 22, 2010.
